Reviews.Title: Samsung Gallaxy
Reviews.Author: jorgearceo52
Reviews.Content: I am SO VERY HAPPY with my new Galaxy S BEST CELLPHONE I EVER HAD!!!!!The shipping was really fast the phone is beautiful!!!I LOVE IT!!! Thank You so Much!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy s Lightray 4G LTE (metroPCS0
Reviews.Author: Carmen
Reviews.Content: Is a good phone, the camera and video work graet.Samsung Galaxy S Lightray 4G LTE Prepaid Android Phone (MetroPCS)

ProductInfo.Features:
4GLTE connectivity with 1 GHz processor
Android platform - 2.3 Gingerbread
8MP camera with LED flash and 720p HD video recording
1.3MP front camera for face-to-face video chat
4.3-inch Super AMOLED Plus touchscreen
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy S Lightray 4G LTE Prepaid Android Phone (MetroPCS)
